channel.title: Projects on craneppeakare
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on craneppeakare

item.title: I Built a Scrabble Trainer to Beat My Friends
item.description: So me and my close friends love playing Discord’s in-client game Letter League, which is based off of the popular word game Scrabble. We’d play for hours at a time and one of our friends in particular, we will call him “Nigel”, tends to consistently win somewhat often. And I’m an ultra competitive person so I built a trainer program to help me find 7 letter words, known as “bingos” in scabble, and go on the training arc of my life and beat him to the ground.

item.title: Creating an Infinite Scroller Minesweeper App
item.description: Right away I knew it would be a great concept however, I was by no means a game dev. Sure, I’ve dabbled here in there making basic platformers and getting used to the basic functions of a game through engines like Godot and Pygame. I sure as hell didn’t know anything about mobile game dev. So how did I do it? It all started when I had the idea to combine the typical infinite scroller style mobile games with an age old classic, Minesweeper, which to my knowledge hadn’t been done yet before.
